ygData.subject: How to build Heritrix 1.x in Eclipse environment
ygData.msgSnippet: Heritrix 1.x is built  by Maven 1.0.2. I am using Eclipse 3.3.2,and want to modify and rebuild the source code. Then I installed the eclipse plugin for maven1
